welcome_message_body: Welcome to Binghamton, a charming city known for its rich history and beautiful natural scenery. We invite you to explore our unique attractions and enjoy all that our city has to offer.

restaurants.name: Chroma Café & Bakery
restaurants.description: Chroma Café & Bakery is a café located in Binghamton.
restaurants.address: 97 Court St (at the Roundabout), Binghamton, NY 13901

restaurants.name: Lost Dog Café
restaurants.description: Lost Dog Café is a new american restaurant located in Binghamton.
restaurants.address: 222 Water St (at Henry St), Binghamton, NY 13901

restaurants.name: Little Venice Restaurant
restaurants.description: Little Venice Restaurant is a italian restaurant located in Binghamton.
restaurants.address: 111 Chenango St (btw Henry and Lewis), Binghamton, NY 13901

restaurants.name: P.S. Restaurant
restaurants.description: P.S. Restaurant is a french restaurant located in Binghamton.

restaurants.name: Rolando's Diner
restaurants.description: Rolando's Diner is a diner located in Binghamton.
restaurants.address: 140 Court St (btw Carroll & Centinary), Binghamton, NY 13901

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Greater Binghamton Airport serves both domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: General Aviation Terminal
terminals.description: The general aviation terminal at Greater Binghamton Airport caters to private and charter flights.

wifi.note: Complimentary WiFi is available throughout the airport.
